00030     if (LogManager::instance_ == NULL){ LogManager::instance_ = new LogManager(); }

00038   ~LogManager(){
00039     //destroy the object only when no handles remain.
00040     //check without blocking.
00041       if(EAGAIN == sem_trywait(&referenceCount_)){
00042         pthread_mutex_destroy(&lock_);
00043         delete instance_;
00044         instance_ = NULL;
00045         listeners_.clear();
00046         sem_destroy(&referenceCount_);
00047       }
00048   }
